## Plot example

```{r fig=TRUE,fig.width=9,fig.height=6}
png("inst/doc/iris.png",width=800,height=500)
data(iris)
par(mfrow=c(1,2),mai=rep(0.8,4))
plot(iris$Sepal.Width~iris$Sepal.Length,
    col=as.numeric(iris$Species)+1,pch=15)
plot(iris$Petal.Width~iris$Petal.Length,
    col=as.numeric(iris$Species)+1,pch=15)
dev.off()
```

![](iris.png)

## Table Example

```{r results="asis"}
df2md(head(iris))
```

## Inline expression

The dataset iris has `r nrow(iris)` plants.

```{.dot eval=true}
digraph { 
    node[style=filled,fillcolor=skyblue];
    rankdir="LR";
    A -> B; 
}
```

```{.puml eval=true}
@startuml
class A { }
class B { }
class C { }
A -> B 
B - C
@enduml
```
